(function () { var network = kiwi.components.Network(); var control = kiwi.components.ControlInput(); var $area = $("#kiwi .controlbox textarea"); var $icon = $('B'); var bold = false; $.fn.toggleClick=function(){ console.log('toggle click'); var functions=arguments, iteration=0 return this.click(function(){ functions[iteration].apply(this,arguments) iteration= (iteration+1) %functions.length }) } $icon.toggleClick(function(){ console.log('bold'); $area.css('font-weight', 'bold'); $icon.parent().addClass('active'); bold = true; },function(){ console.log('unbold'); $area.css('font-weight', ''); $icon.parent().removeClass('active'); bold = false; }); $area.keydown(function(e){ var code = e.keyCode || e.which; if(code == 13 && bold){ $area.val('\x02'+$area.val()); } }); control.addPluginIcon($icon); })();
